column5: Hahahah thats wicked! Wish I got to do that when I was little! Now you just need to build some ramps/jumps!
Looks like you guys had a blast!!
Cool, looks like fun!  Love the slo mo dog jump
Looks like a blast,  we did it as kids nowadays people might make you aut to be bad parents because its so " dangerous"
I have a friend whos 8yr old son was killed doing just that. Just sayin...  S.
I have a friend whos 8yr old son was killed doing just that. Just sayin...  S.   Wow..what happened?

I lost count of how many gloves I lost bumper skiing behind cars. We even used tow ropes and snow boards skies saucers trashcan lids etc. Mostly bumps and bruises from the activities but no worse than sledding down a hill.     Art
Simon, Great video, you guys really know how to have family fun up there, you will all have lifetime memories. How is the rink looking?

I lost count of how many gloves I lost bumper skiing behind cars. We even used tow ropes and snow boards skies saucers trashcan lids etc. Mostly bumps and bruises from the activities but no worse than sledding down a hill.     Art   I remember as a kid (1971 when i was 3 or 4) we used to go to Christie Pits Park on Bloor. That was some hill! After we would always  go to a place called Ed's Ice Cream Parlour (not to be confused with the one at The Beaches now). Hot fudge sundae and a nickel in the duke box to play The Popcorn Song………..WOW….I loved Techno music before there was techno music LOLOL.    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q_wy_Pr1bqM&list=RDNjxNnqTcHhg

LMAO  Bumper shagg,n. I went through 3 pairs of my best sunday shoes. They were the best for sliding. Not so good though when you got caught wearing them on a saturday. Up side the head comes to my memory.  Simon  Christie pits hills were the best. Memories.  Havent heard the pop corn tune (HOT BUTTER) in a long time. Thanks.
